doc:
Julia Bruns https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julia_Bruns 0 Julia Eliza Bruns (1895 – December 24, 1927) was an American stage and silent film actress and model. Bruns came to prominence for her work as a model. Her image was illustrated by artist James Montgomery Flagg in 1917. She appeared on numerous magazine covers and Sunday feature pages. Once called "America's most beautiful girl", she eventually succumbed to alcoholism and drug addiction and died at age 32. Julia_Eliza_Bruns ( 1895 – December_24 , 1927 ) was an_American_stage and silent_film_actress_and_model . Bruns came to prominence for her_work as a_model . Her_image was_illustrated by artist_James_Montgomery_Flagg in 1917 . She appeared on numerous_magazine_covers and Sunday_feature_pages . Once called " America 's most_beautiful_girl_" , she eventually succumbed to alcoholism_and_drug_addiction and died at age_32 .
